                                  int enrollmentCap,

                                  int startTime,
                                  int endTime)
        Adds a course to the course catalog
        Parameters:
        name - course name
        title - course title
        section - course section number
        credits - course credits
        instructorId - course instructor id
        enrollmentCap - max number of students in class
        meetingDays - course meeting days
        startTime - course start time
        endTime - course end time
        Returns:
        if the course was added
